means: 擦掉( efface的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Someone has effaced part of the address on his letter.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人把他信上的一部分地址擦掉了.

sentence.Network_en: The name of the ship had been effaced from the menus.
sentence.Network_cn: 那艘船的名字已经从菜单中删除了。

sentence.Network_en: I was debarrassed of interruption; my half - effaced thought instantly revived.
sentence.Network_cn: 我摆脱了干扰; 我的一半已被磨灭的思想立即活跃起来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...forewater rupture,做人工破水一定要在产房,且要完全无菌,子宫颈最好是软的,已经开始消失,effaced,而且至少扩张两厘米以上,另外最好是头产式且胎头已固定,做破水时这些条件通常无法全部满足,要满足多少.
It seemed that the very memory of her was effaced from his mind ., 对她的记忆似乎已在他的心中冲淡了.

list.abs: They were both self - effacing ., 他们两人都十分谦逊.
She ' s brilliant but self - effacing ., 她才华横溢而不露锋芒.
Time effaced the memory ., 时间抹去了记忆.
effable 能被说出的efface oneself 自卑efface 抹掉
hardscape的意思中文翻译 ... efface 抹掉 efface oneself 埋没自己, 不露面 effacement 抹消, 抹杀.
time effaced the memory .时间抹掉了记忆。

entry.def: To efface something means to destroy or remove it so that it cannot be seen any more.

example.ex: ...an event that has helped efface the country's traditional image...
example.tran: 帮助该国改变了以往形象改观的事件

example.ex: The name of the ship had been effaced from the menus.
example.tran: 那艘船的名字已经从选择菜单中删除了。

auth_sentence.content: New events and experiences were effaced almost instantly.
auth_sentence.res_content: New events and experiences were effaced almost instantly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New events and experiences were effaced almost instantly.
